name: Easyread – make your blogs more readable
author: HNR Tech

sections.description: The plugin helps you make your blogs more readable. It splits your blogs or pages with large paragraphs into smaller paragraphs. You can define which pages/blogs to include or override the settings for.
sections.installation:
1. Install Easyread either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate Easyread through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the Easyread settings at the administration menu >> Settings >> Easyread.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work for pages & blogs?

Yes, it works for both pages and blogs

Can you override the global settings?

Yes, you can over global settings at at post-level or page-level.

Can you disable plugin settings for a particular blog/post?

Yes, you can define which posts/pages you don’t want to auto-split.
